marketingInfo.description:
While deploying instances on public cloud, the biggest challenge faced by enterprises is to meet hardening requirements for these servers. Infosec requirements for hardening the servers especially production web servers are quite stringent.Server hardening process provides a solid edifice to build and deploy secure apps. These Instances are hardened based on Microsoft security baseline recommendations, Industry best practices and CIS hardening checklists.

Customers who are planning to harden their web servers for production deployment should look no further. This image includes IIS with ASP.Net (3.5 and 4.6), PHP and Node.js specially designed for enterprise deployments.

This is a single web server image which takes care of multiple different application framework deployments, making it easy for you to deploy any kind of application (.Net/PHP/Nodejs) within the same machine.

ASP.Net on IIS needs no introduction, and availability of multiple versions of .Net framework helps users to target legacy as well as applications using the latest .Net framework

Node.js is an open-source, cross-platform run time environment for developing server-side Web applications. Although Node.js is not a JavaScript framework, many of its basic modules are written in JavaScript, and developers can write new modules in JavaScript. The run time environment interprets JavaScript using Google’s V8 JavaScript engine.

PHP is a server-side scripting language designed for web development but also used as a general-purpose programming language. Originally created by Rasmus Lerdorf in 1994, the PHP reference implementation is now produced by The PHP Group. PHP originally stood for Personal Home Page, but it now stands for the recursive backronym PHP: Hypertext Processor.
